title: If 2020 was a person, how would he look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends how your year is going, In my case it is like a grandfather who keeps torturing me for hardwork and also at the same time asks me to relax and tells me the tales that happiness matters not money. Since this year started I'm struggling to conquer my goals but when I don't hear something worth my hardwork it disappoints me everyday but in night all my heart tells me that it's okay to fail, I've done my job honestly, I should continue my hardwork and should chase for happiness. Goal shouldn't be career wise but it should be for happy life.
